Weapon.Name: Hatchet
Weapon.Description: A small axe with a short handle for use in one hand.

Weapon.Name: Hand Scythe (Sickle)
Weapon.Description: A short-handled farming tool with a semicircular blade, used for cutting grain, lopping, or trimming.

Weapon.Name: Hand Axe
Weapon.Description: A short-handled, one-handed axe intended to be used as a melee weapon.

Weapon.Name: Throwing Axe
Weapon.Description: An axe that is designed to be used as a close range, throwing weapon or as a melee weapon.

Weapon.Name: Felling Axe
Weapon.Description: An axe designed for cutting down trees. It can also be used as an effective melee weapon.

Weapon.Name: Large Scythe
Weapon.Description: An agricultural hand tool for mowing grass or reaping crops. It can also be used for reaping souls.

Weapon.Name: War Axe
Weapon.Description: A superior, versatile axe intended to be used as a melee weapon.

Weapon.Name: Great Axe
Weapon.Description: A military, two-handed axe intended to be used as a melee weapon.

Weapon.Name: Horse Bow
Weapon.Description: A crossbow that employs winches, gears, and cogs to significantly increase the possible damage, accuracy, and range of said bow.

Weapon.Name: Horn Bow
Weapon.Description: A bow that has been fashioned from the horns of a dragon.

Weapon.Name: Bow
Weapon.Description: A weapon that is used to propel an arrow which consists of a strip of flexible material with a cord connecting the two ends and holding the strip bent.

Weapon.Name: Long Bow
Weapon.Description: A bow with longer limbs and greater range than a traditional bow.

Weapon.Name: Recurve Bow
Weapon.Description: A bow with limbs that curve away from the archer when unstrung.

Weapon.Name: Hand Crossbow
Weapon.Description: A simple, one-handed crossbow which is drawn back by hand.

Weapon.Name: Light Crossbow
Weapon.Description: A simple, light crossbow which is drawn back by pulling a lever.

Weapon.Name: Footman's Crossbow
Weapon.Description: A crossbow that is commonly used by footmen.

Weapon.Name: Heavy Crossbow
Weapon.Description: A simple, heavy crossbow which is drawn back by turning a small winch.

Weapon.Name: Ball and Chain
Weapon.Description: A gigantic metal sphere that is lined with sparse spikes and attached to a metal chain.

Weapon.Name: Horseman's Flail
Weapon.Description: A flail that is commonly used by horsemen.

Weapon.Name: Holy Water Sprinkler
Weapon.Description: A morning star that resembles the aspergillum used in the Catholic Mass.

Weapon.Name: Footman's Flail
Weapon.Description: A flail that is commonly used by footmen.

Weapon.Name: Large Holy Water Sprinkler
Weapon.Description: A large morning star that resembles the aspergillum used in the Catholic Mass.

Weapon.Name: Double Flail (Nun Chuka)
Weapon.Description: A flail consisting of two sticks connected at one end by a short chain or rope.

Weapon.Name: Great Flail
Weapon.Description: A polearm with a very large striking head attached by a short length of chain.

Weapon.Name: Small Hammer
Weapon.Description: A small melee weapon intended for close combat action whose design resembles a hammer.

Weapon.Name: Horseman's Mace
Weapon.Description: A mace that is commonly used by horsemen.

Weapon.Name: Morning Star
Weapon.Description: A club-like weapon consisting of a shaft with an attached ball adorned with one or more spikes.

Weapon.Name: Footman's Mace
Weapon.Description: A mace that is commonly used by footmen.

Weapon.Name: Spike Hammer
Weapon.Description: A spiked melee weapon intended for close combat action whose base design resembles a hammer.

Weapon.Name: Maul
Weapon.Description: A military, two-handed hammer which is intended to be used as a melee weapon.

Weapon.Name: Spear
Weapon.Description: A weapon with a long shaft and a pointed tip used for thrusting or throwing.

Weapon.Name: Lance
Weapon.Description: A long weapon for thrusting, consisting of a wooden shaft and a pointed metal head, formerly used by a horseman in charging.

Weapon.Name: Glaive
Weapon.Description: A polearm consisting of a single-edged blade on the end of a pole.

Weapon.Name: Halberd
Weapon.Description: A spear and battle axe combined into a polearm.

Weapon.Name: Bardiche
Weapon.Description: A type of glaive that consists of a long, cleaver type blade mounted to a pole.

Weapon.Name: Military Hammer
Weapon.Description: A military melee weapon intended for close combat action whose design resembles a hammer.

Weapon.Name: Hand Sling
Weapon.Description: A basic sling that is held in the user's hand and launches blunt objects.

Weapon.Name: Staff Sling
Weapon.Description: A sling that is attached to the end of a wooden rod, which increases the force of the projectile.

Weapon.Name: Light Staff
Weapon.Description: A long, lightweight stick used as a weapon.

Weapon.Name: Blade Staff
Weapon.Description: A Staff with a blade on the end used in melee combat. The other end of the Blade-Staff holds a magic material that acts as an arcane focus.

Weapon.Name: Quarter Staff
Weapon.Description: A simple, two-handed staff which can be treated as two weapons in a fight.

Weapon.Name: Shod Staff
Weapon.Description: A sturdy quarter staff reinforced with metal at each end.

Weapon.Name: Knife
Weapon.Description: An instrument composed of a blade fixed into a handle, used as a weapon.

Weapon.Name: Dagger
Weapon.Description: A short knife with a pointed and edged blade, used as a weapon.

Weapon.Name: Dagger, Maine-Gauche
Weapon.Description: A dagger, held in the left hand in dueling, that is used to parry the sword of an opponent.

Weapon.Name: Footman's Sword
Weapon.Description: A sword that is commonly used by footmen.

Weapon.Name: Rapier
Weapon.Description: A thin, light, sharp-pointed sword used for thrusting.

Weapon.Name: Sabre
Weapon.Description: A heavy cavalry sword with a curved blade and a single cutting edge.

Weapon.Name: Cutlass
Weapon.Description: A short sword with a slightly curved blade.

Weapon.Name: Scimitar
Weapon.Description: A short sword with a curved blade that broadens toward the point.

Weapon.Name: Long Sword
Weapon.Description: A long, two-handed sword that has a cruciform hilt and a straight double-edged blade.

Weapon.Name: Bastard Sword
Weapon.Description: A sword that is neither a longsword nor a greatsword, but something in between.

Weapon.Name: Great Sword
Weapon.Description: A massive, two-handed sword with a broad, double-edged blade, usually intended for slicing rather than stabbing.

Weapon.Name: Javelin
Weapon.Description: A light spear thrown as a weapon.

Weapon.Name: Whip
Weapon.Description: A strip of leather or length of cord fastened to a handle, used for flogging or beating a person or for urging on an animal.

Weapon.Name: Wire Whip
Weapon.Description: A whip that consists of a spool of monofilament wire with a weighted tip.

Weapon.Name: Multipart Whip
Weapon.Description: A handle with multiple strips of leather or lengths of cord fastened to it.

Weapon.Name: Rope
Weapon.Description: A length of strong cord made by twisting together strands of either natural or artificial fibers.

Weapon.Name: Blow Pipe
Weapon.Description: A long tube through which an arrow or dart is propelled by the force of the user's breath.

Weapon.Name: Double Sticks
Weapon.Description: Two sticks which can be utilized as two blunt, melee weapons.

Weapon.Name: Caltrop
Weapon.Description: A spiked metal device thrown on the ground to impede cavalry horses.

Weapon.Name: Arrows (20)
Weapon.Description: A shaft sharpened at the front and with feathers or vanes at the back, shot from a bow as a weapon. (x20)

Weapon.Name: Axe, orc double
Weapon.Description: An axe with a double-edged blade, commonly used by orcs.

Weapon.Name: Battle Axe
Weapon.Description: A large, broad-bladed axe used in combat.

Weapon.Name: Bolas
Weapon.Description: A number of balls connected by strong cord which when thrown entangles the limbs of the victim.

Weapon.Name: Spiked Chain
Weapon.Description: A chain, about 4 feet in length, that is covered in wicked barbs and spikes.

Weapon.Name: Crossbow Bolts (10)
Weapon.Description: An arrow used in a crossbow, sometimes called a quarrel. (x10)

Weapon.Name: Repeating Crossbow Bolts (5)
Weapon.Description: An arrow used in a repeating crossbow, sometimes called a quarrel. (x5)

Weapon.Name: Heavy Repeating Crossbow
Weapon.Description: A massive, lever-activated crossbow that utilizes an integral magazine to rapidly fire missiles at targets. It's less of a crossbow and more of a man-portable siege weapon.

Weapon.Name: Light Repeating Crossbow
Weapon.Description: A lever-activated crossbow that utilizes an integral magazine to rapidly shower a foe with missiles.

Weapon.Name: Punching Dagger
Weapon.Description: A short-bladed dagger with a T-shaped handle designed to be grasped in the hand so that the blade protrudes from the front of one's fist, typically between the index and middle finger.

Weapon.Name: Dart
Weapon.Description: A small pointed missile that can be thrown or fired.

Weapon.Name: Falchion
Weapon.Description: A broad, slightly curved sword with the cutting edge on the convex side.

Weapon.Name: Flail
Weapon.Description: A threshing tool consisting of a wooden staff with a short heavy stick swinging from it.

Weapon.Name: Dire Flail
Weapon.Description: A stout haft with two flails mounted on either end of it, shorter than a quarterstaff.

Weapon.Name: Heavy Flail
Weapon.Description: A flail that has a larger metal ball and a longer handle than other flails.

Weapon.Name: Great Club
Weapon.Description: A two-handed club that is bigger and heavier than a regular club.

Weapon.Name: Guisarme
Weapon.Description: A spear-tipped polearm with a hooked blade.

Weapon.Name: Gnome Hooked Hammer
Weapon.Description: A double weapon and ingenious tool with a Hammer head at one end of its haft and a long, curved pick at the other.

Weapon.Name: Light Hammer
Weapon.Description: A lightweight melee weapon intended for close combat action whose design resembles a hammer.

Weapon.Name: Heavy Pick
Weapon.Description: A larger version of a war pick that is usually used by the dwarves in their underground exploration for both mining and self defense.

Weapon.Name: Kama
Weapon.Description: A farming tool similar to a sickle, used for reaping crops and as a weapon.

Weapon.Name: Kukri
Weapon.Description: A knife with an inwardly curved blade, similar to a machete, used as both a tool and as a weapon.

Weapon.Name: Composite Longbow
Weapon.Description: A bow made out of multiple, different materials with longer limbs and greater range than a traditional bow.

Weapon.Name: Long Spear
Weapon.Description: A long, well-polished shaft with a heavy, sharp blade attached at one end.

Weapon.Name: Heavy Mace
Weapon.Description: A mace that has a larger head and a longer handle than a light mace.

Weapon.Name: Light Mace
Weapon.Description: A melee weapon that is made up of an ornate metal head attached to a simple wooden or metal shaft.

Weapon.Name: Net
Weapon.Description: A device made of strands that weave in and out with open spaces in between and is used to hold or catch something.

Weapon.Name: Light Pick
Weapon.Description: A military, one-handed pick that is designed to concentrate its force on a small, penetrating point for use in war.

Weapon.Name: Ranseur
Weapon.Description: A polearm with a spear-like head, with a crescent-shaped cross hilt.

Weapon.Name: Sai
Weapon.Description: A dagger with two sharp prongs curving outward from the hilt, sometimes used in pairs.

Weapon.Name: Sap
Weapon.Description: A flexible leather truncheon with a lead-filled striking end, sometimes called a blackjack.

Weapon.Name: Scythe
Weapon.Description: A tool used for cutting crops such as grass or wheat, with a long curved blade at the end of a long pole attached to which are one or two short handles.

Weapon.Name: Short Bow
Weapon.Description: A bow with shorter limbs and more mobility than a traditional bow.

Weapon.Name: Composite Short Bow
Weapon.Description: A bow made out of multiple, different materials with shorter limbs and more mobility than a traditional bow.

Weapon.Name: Short Spear
Weapon.Description: A short, well-polished shaft with a light, sharp blade attached at one end. It can be wielded in one hand due to its size.

Weapon.Name: Shuriken (5)
Weapon.Description: A star with projecting blades or points, used as a missile.

Weapon.Name: Siangham
Weapon.Description: A handheld shaft fitted with a pointed tip resembling a much sturdier arrow with a grip designed for melee combat.

Weapon.Name: Sling Bullets (10)
Weapon.Description: A blunt bullet that is intended to be launched by a sling-like weapon. They come in a leather pouch that holds 10 bullets.

Weapon.Name: Stale Bread
Weapon.Description: It's probably still edible, but why eat it when you can use it as a melee weapon?

Weapon.Name: Stale Flower
Weapon.Description: It has certainly seen better days, but maybe, it can have a second life as a melee weapon.

Weapon.Name: Short Sword
Weapon.Description: A smaller version of the longsword but longer than a dagger or dirk, having many of the same parts including a generally double-edged blade, cross-guard, grip, and pommel.

Weapon.Name: Two-Bladed Sword
Weapon.Description: A polearm with a wooden haft with a broad 18-inch blade at each tip.

Weapon.Name: Trident
Weapon.Description: A three-pronged spear.

Weapon.Name: Dwarven Urgosh
Weapon.Description: A double weapon that consists of an axe head and a spear point on opposite ends of a long haft.

Weapon.Name: Dwarven War Axe
Weapon.Description: A large, two-handed axe that consists of a large, ornate head mounted to a thick handle.

Weapon.Name: War Hammer
Weapon.Description: A large, heavy sledge hammer that was originally adapted from the tools of laborers and craftsmen but is no longer suitable for anything but combat.
